user.description: The PostgreSQL user to authenticate as. Default: process.env.PGUSER or process.env.USER.

password.description: The password of that PostgreSQL user. Default: process.env.PGPASSWORD.

host.description: The hostname of the database you are connecting to. Default: process.env.PGHOST.

port.description: The port number to connect to. Default: process.env.PGPORT.

database.description: Name of the database to use for this connection. Default: process.env.PGDATABASE or user.

connectionString.description: A connection string to use instead of specifying individual parameters. e.g. postgres://user:password@host:5432/database.

ssl.description: SSL configuration, passed directly to node.TLSSocket. Supports all tls.connect options.

statement_timeout.description: Milliseconds before a statement in query will time out. Default: no timeout.

query_timeout.description: Milliseconds before a query call will timeout. Default: no timeout.

lock_timeout.description: Milliseconds a query is allowed to be in lock state before it's cancelled due to lock timeout.

application_name.description: The name of the application that created this Client instance.

connectionTimeoutMillis.description: Milliseconds to wait for connection. Default: no timeout.

keepAliveInitialDelayMillis.description: Initial delay before the first keepalive probe is sent on an idle socket.

idle_in_transaction_session_timeout.description: Milliseconds before terminating any session with an open idle transaction. Default: no timeout.

client_encoding.description: Specifies the character set encoding that the database uses for sending data to the client.

fallback_application_name.description: Application name to use if application_name is not set.

options.description: Command-line options to be sent to the server.
